title: 1 dead, 3 hurt in overnight shootings
content:
LAS VEGAS
Metro Police are investigating a deadly Saturday overnight shooting near Hollywood and Desert Inn.
According to police, three victims were hurt in four different locations in what appears to be “disagreements gone bad" shortly after 2:30 a.m.
One male juvenile was killed and the shooter is still at large with homicide detectives investigating several areas.
Investigators say earlier in the night there was a large gathering of individuals at a park in the 5000 block of Hollywood Boulevard. At some point during the gathering there was a large physical altercation.
As the parties were leaving, there was gunfire during which four victims were struck. Three of the victims transported themselves to area hospitals with non-life threatening injuries, while the fourth victim was pronounced deceased at the scene.
No arrests have been made and the motive remains unknown.
This is the 83rd homicide in Metro’s jurisdiction this year.
